title: N28 Allen & Ginter HOF John M Ward - CHEAP!
author: IronHorse2130

posts.post_title: N28 Allen & Ginter HOF John M Ward - CHEAP!
posts.post_content:
I've decided to thin out my Hall of Fame collection and am offering the cards here on the forum before going to eBay.  I purchased all of these with great eye appeal in mind so they present very nicely.  

Shipping is a flat $6.00 for priority mail regardless of how many cards you purchase.  Payment can be made via PayPal (please add 3% or mark as a gift) or via check/money order.  I will also be listing some 1930's, 50's and 60's HOF cards so check the other BST sections.  Please email me at [url]benlevinsohn@gmail.com[/url] with any questions.  Thanks!

N28 Allen & Ginter John M Ward – Graded Authentic, Trimmed by PSA.  Card is beautiful looking but was trimmed along the top.  FINAL REDUCTION to $225.00 shipped!

[URL=http://s248.photobucket.com/user/IronHorse2130/media/Baseball%20BST/Ward1_zpse10d8ffe.jpg.html][IMG]http://i248.photobucket.com/albums/gg184/IronHorse2130/Baseball%20BST/Ward1_zpse10d8ffe.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Forgot I had this card so let's give it a bump to the top along with a reduction in price.
Card has been sold and shipped.  Thank you to the buyer.
